website_summaries.verdict: An affordable comforter that doesn't compromise on quality or warmth.
pros: Soft and lightweight but still warm
Sits at a remarkably low price point for the quality
Machine wash safe on gentle cold cycle
cons: Comforter runs a little small, won't have much overhang

customer_reviews.title: This comforter runs very small. I ordered the queen ...
customer_reviews.text: This comforter runs very small . I ordered the queen size for my bed and it doesn’t cover the whole bed. It barely reaches the end of my bed. If I would’ve known that it runs small I would have ordered a king size.
customer_reviews.author: Jad

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch quality and a stunning comforter that adds elegance and style to any bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best comforters I've had in recent years and the quality is top-notch. There are some lint bunnies that you need to pick off the comforter, but that is to be expected. The packaging was exceptional and shipping was fast. The comforter is fluffy yet lightweight and very soft to the touch. I have a queen-size bed but went up a size to a King size which is the perfect size I wanted. I highly recommend this comforter to anyone who's looking for very affordable and stylish comforter that'll just make your room pop with elegance and a design is timeless. I hope you found this review helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Peters

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sooooo looking forward to receiving this, as it was time to get a new comforter. Upon opening it was so beautiful, soft, plush, appeared to be made of good quality. Boy I was disappointed once I put it on my king bed...it was so short...didn’t even make it over the sides....it would probably fit a full size bed but far from a king.....do not recommend this comforter. Awful size measurements!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews state - it’s almost too small. I couldn’t size up because I have a king bed. It barely covers the mattress. But for the price I’m not returning. I can make it work. It’s super soft. There was some loose fuzz but no holes or stains like some have complained about. I’d give it 5 stars if it was sized right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: After reading mixed reviews I almost didn't order this comforter. When it came in the mail it was packaged so small I was worried it would be thin and uncomfortable, but when I took it out of the bag it ended up being a huge plush comforter. It is the most comfortable bedding I've ever had and I seriously feel like I'm being hugged when I lay in bed! There was some stuffing sticking out of the seams in places but I washed it and haven't had an issue at all since.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole diegert

customer_reviews.title: Just like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out of the packaging. Looks just like pictures. Pillow covers were more than expected. They actually have the trim like in the photos rather than just a cover. My one worry was a review that I saw about it not covering the whole bed. I don’t have this problem. If you want your covers to drape more down the sides maybe just get a bigger size. I wouldn’t have liked mine any longer. Perfect so far!
customer_reviews.author: nantucket

customer_reviews.title: Item was delivered very quickly. Comforter was as stated ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered very quickly. Comforter was as stated. A little thin, but not badly so. However, the 2 pillow shams were missing from package....which appeared to be opened. Update: After alerting the seller to my issue, I received a quick response. They fixed the issue in a very timely and satisfactorily way. So I added another star for great customer service. Comforter has now been on my bed for 2 weeks and holding up well. I purchased a king for my queen sized bed just as I would if I was purchasing in most stores. It fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is light but keeps you very warm. It's cotton filled and is fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Herman L.

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy, poor stitching, short
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful coming out of the package, HOWEVER, it falls apart after the first wash. I am pregnant & expecting a new born any moment now & could not afford to put a brand new product in my room without washing it. With just 1 wash, following the directions, and air drying - this comforter has fuzz all over, the inside pieces have move around changing the shape, some of the stitching is coming out. Also, for a king size, it is almost too short, had to be tucked into look ok. I love the color, but not worth the price nor headache.
customer_reviews.author: Mari_not_mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this Comforter set in Grey for a bed in the nursery. I was due to have a C-section and my mother came to stay with me. My mom loved this comforter set. She stated that the material was extremely soft and warm enough for her to stay comfortable since I have the house so cold with all of these postpartum hormones. Ha! The comforter set last even with washing it every week and you can not beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: H. Torres

customer_reviews.title: It’s smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a king size of this comforter for a queen sized bed hoping for it to be draped down the sides similarly to the picture. It arrived and is a nice color and a light weight but the size it definitely barely a queen. The shame that came with it are king sized but the comforter itself is smaller than a king size. It’s very warm but I wish it were a bit wider. Kinda disappointed. Edit to add : I measured and the dimensions are actually 92”x103”
customer_reviews.author: P M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and fit. This comforter is not too hot for TX heat. Overall I say good find for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sized correctly. Too small. Defective fabric and dye areas.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight and the material is soft. It looks wonderful and long in all of the ad photos but they must have put the king on a full bed. This is what it looks like on my king bed with one side at the bottom of the mattress and the other side way above that. The length is also short unless you are short or sleep curled up on a ball. There are places where the fabric weave is messed up and it didn’t dye properly. There are also a lot of hanging threads and filling sticking out. At least the price was good and I guess that I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: A Tackett

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found that one comforter that I was looking for. Funny as it is I loved my kids spongebob blanket I wanted that softness and it happen to be microfiber. This conforter is exactly what I wanted and more. More because its on the heavy side and for my anxiety it was perfect. Now its not very heavy but is not this light microfiber blanket either lets agree its perfect. First night my son slept with us had an accident I dreaded having to wash it so soon, washed it and wow it came out perfect didnt ball up, didnt shrink, fade nothing. I liked it so much I bought another one in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: rcruz

customer_reviews.title: I love the comforter but I do wish it was sized ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the comforter but I do wish it was sized a little bigger as there is barely anything to hang off the ends of the bed as other reviews stated. I was not satisfied with the shams at all as I received them and on the same day, I tried gently placing my normal sized pillow inside it and it tore instantly. My rating is based on the cheaply made shams which were disappointing and the fact that the comforter was more a full size, not a queen as advertised. The comforter is soft and squishy, I like it, I just hope it holds up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Only 80" x 96" for King size.
customer_reviews.text: Product is only 80 inches wide by 96 inches long. Almost exactly as wide as my king bed. The description says it's significantly wider and longer than it is. Not true, and in fact a bold faced lie. Comforter is extremely thin and had almost no padding inside it. Terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mac k.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this. The material feels really cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. The material feels really cheap and the sizing is way off. I have a normal queen size bed, but the comforter wasn't even long enough to cover the sides of the mattress, no matter how I arranged it. Silly me missed the return deadline, so I'm just going to donate it because there's no way I can use it. The picture is really deceptive. Seriously, just don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Northedge

customer_reviews.title: Not a set! Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is nice but the two pillow shams that were supposed to be included were not in the package. Very disappointed that they were no shams, I bought this one because shams were included. It says “comforter set” and says includes two pillow shams. Very misleading. If I only wanted a comforter I would have bought just the comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Bird

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love crawling into bed every night snuggling under this comforter. It is so soft and has a luxurious feel. I didnt think a comforter could improve my sleep and this one does. It comes shipped in airtight bag. I unwrapped and made bed. After a few hours it fluffed up and looked beautiful!! I ordered a king for my queen based on reviews of it being a bit small. Glad I did. King size fits well, hangs over side and foot great, and gives just enough extra no one fights over the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Brande Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality - Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing you get what you pay for but the reviews were so good I thought it’d be fine for an AirBnB house. Wrong. It’s filling is bunched after the first washing. It’s too small to come down to an appropriate length on a queen size bed. It’s filling also comes out through the material leaving little balls of fuzz all over it and the floor. Which needless to say is no good. I would absolutely not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: C&AE&MW&MW

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LOW QUALITY COMFORTER!  FALLING APART ON DAY ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: don’t judge how your bed will look by their picture. Mine doesn’t hang nearly over the sides as their picture shown. I guess I should had measured the bed and looked at the specs of this comforter... just know this doesn’t have much hang over on a queen like it shows in the pictures... maybe order a California King comforter? ***UPDATE*** I didn’t notice till one night sleeping under it that the comforter had a sewn not sewn together. The quality of this product is garbage. Will NOT buy again. I’ll pay more for a quality product this time. Sending back to Amazon today!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It’s thinner than my blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is so thin it’s barely a comforter. It’s also more a shade of green than gray. I don’t know how an item has that many great reviews that contradict everything about the actual product. I thought because it was air sealed that it would fluff up. It’s like 2/3 of my stuffing went to a different comforter. The size is good it’s way bigger than expected and nearly touched the ground on my queen size bed. This leads me to believe that there is 100% stuffing missing from this since everyone else seemed to have an issue with it being too small.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for! Not in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a zero. I should have spent a little extra for quality. The comforter is nice color and design. The quality is terrible I have little rips and strings hanging out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Photo is a lie....too small
customer_reviews.text: I love this pattern, and the material is soft. I bought the king size for a long bed....it barely covers the top of the bed...I like it to hang over the sides at least a foot or so...nope...way too small and not at all like the photo. Keeping because it's too much of a hassle to return, but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jamie underhill

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I followed through and ordered this item
customer_reviews.text: WORTH EVERY DIME! I was just a bit skeptical about ordering bedding from vendor based on the feedback! I am glad I followed through and ordered this item. IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. The size was PERFECT for my king sized bed and the color & softness was just as described. There was some lint or cotton all over the bed, but no big deal. A lint brush took care of it. I didn’t need a bed skirt bc the bed sits lower to the floor. It sufficiently covered both sides of the bed! Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. Renee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my other one was a duvet like this and had to use a Comforter and since I live in Houston. Wanted something a bit lighter and this does that. Its warm enough on a cold night and light enough for the hot nights. Very durable as my dog has definetly tried wearing it out.. Very nice handiwork. Definetly would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Camaran Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: I was so disappointed since this comforter got such great ratings
customer_reviews.text: The grey was faded in areas of the comforter, I was so disappointed since this comforter got such great ratings. I guess this is a hit or miss product and I just received one that wasn't dyed correctly. It is super soft and made well, just the faded areas was the only issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bordering on too warm, but I love it
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to shut the heat vent in my room over the winter to be able to sleep with this comforter and not sweat to death, but it's a really comfortable weight. I miss it now that I've moved on to a super lightweight thing for summer. When it was delivered I was skeptical because it had batting/stuffing scattered all around the outside, but I lint roller-ed it up and it's been great ever since.
customer_reviews.author: corig123

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I have a queen size bed and bought the king size blanket based on previous reviews and it’s the perfect size. So definitely go up a size! This is worth it for sure. Lightweight, keeps you at perfect temperature, comfortable. Haven’t washed it yet.. The only thing is that it isn’t gray... it’s brown. I don’t care either way but some do.. Whoever made it must be color blind. Quit looking for something else- this is the one! 😉
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Not too Hot, Not too Cold
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter. I purchased a different one a few months ago that was microfiber and it got way too hot. This one is perfect in that it keeps me warm, but I'm not waking up soaked in sweat. Plus, the design is modern and perfect for the theme I was going for. I like how it came with 2 pillow covers as well. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wathan48

customer_reviews.title: very cheap fabric
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two twin beds that are rarely used. I ordered full size for because other reviews said the comforter ran small. Full size fits a twin bed. The fabric is the flimsiest I have ever seen, thinner than cheap microfiber sheets, and the filling is clumpy. I do not recommend this bedding and will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa319

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great product.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but, for this purchase, I will, because I feel this comforter set is a great value. The thickness of the comforter is perfect for my cool coastal climate, not too thick, not too thin. Just right for all seasons. The pillow shame a bonus, as I am a single guy, so, things like pillow shame best left for the interior designer folk...they do look nice, I have to admit. After numerous sham sets bought over the last 35 years, I will say this set gets the #1 ranking. I did not get paid to write this!
customer_reviews.author: calvin goddard

customer_reviews.title: It looks to be in great condition and so far we love it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, and was packaged very neatly. It looks to be in great condition and so far we love it. Only negative is that it smells really weird right after opening. I am unable to wash that big of an item in my washer, so i had to settle for using fabric spray but it seems to have worked in the meantime. I believe it was just because of the plastic wrapping it came in to keep it small and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda LaDuke

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: It’s thinner than expected and does not keep me warm. Order a size up! I got a queen for my full size bed and it just fits. A full would have def not fit. All in all I am returning this because the place I live in has no heat and I’m too cold. Plus I prefer fluffy comforters for coziness.
customer_reviews.author: Aalia

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Can't wash it in the washer which is ridiculous. The seams throughout the middle have all started coming apart after just a couple months. And it's noisy but I was used to it after a week. It's soooooooo warm though which is awesome. I'm a cold person and tend to keep ice cold toes under most blankets but this one warms them up. So 2 stars for warm toes.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Warm, Thick, Plush, Cozy and Pretty Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this comforter as an extra blanket to have available this winter. I am so happy that I did! When it arrived it was in a zippered bag and it appeared to be flat, thin and small. Therefore, I do admit that initially, I was skeptical of its quality. However, I went ahead and took it out of the bag and left it sitting overnight. When I awoke the next morning I was completely amazed when I picked it up. It felt really thick, plush and heavy in my hands. Finally, I spread it out on a bed and was immediately impressed. I definitely will be buying at least one or two more of this comforter.
customer_reviews.author: CheleB

customer_reviews.title: SOFT BEAUTIFUL PERFECT FIT BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing this due to some of the reviews mentioning it being too small for a king size bed.. Its the exact perfect fit. If you want something that hangs down over the side, this is not for you. But if you want an amazing cover, that is light breathable and yet keeps you comfortably warm, this is the blanket for you! My boyfriend is super picky, and he even loves it! We ordered a duvet insert from this brand first for our daughters bed, and now that we have ours we will continue to buy from them. SO happy with the quality for the price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shayne Torres

customer_reviews.title: Thick&Soft..But Poorly Made!!!
customer_reviews.text: Apon opening it i thought it was Beautiful..But Definitely a Brownish Grey color!! Then i Noticed it had a 4-5in opening in the seam!! Very Disappointing!!! Contacting Customer service wasnt Much Help! I got a Replacement coming..Just hope this 1s better!? Now i have to cram this Huge comforter into a box&return it! What A Hassle!! Im Sure its Noce if you get a Properly Made One!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley %

customer_reviews.title: Very nice King comforter set
customer_reviews.text: I truly was skeptical about this purchase even though I read all the reviews and many of them were quite complementary. It arrived today in this teeny we need tiny package which made me even more skeptical but as I opened it and let the air out of it it turned out to be a very nice king comforter. It's soft it seems to be durable but only time will tell after it's washed. But I like the pattern very much. I did buy a king size for my queen size bed which I like very much it being a bit oversized. I would recommend it I will update if things change
customer_reviews.author: Gumdlops Don't bother to waste your time very unrealistic plot line

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Hit buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant after reading reviews however, This is great!! Its super cute and cozy, ive had it two months now and its help up to two toddlers and multiple washes. I ordered a King size bevause i like having a little more blanket but a queen will fit a queen size bed perfectly. Its light weight but warm enough for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Color is off
customer_reviews.text: Every time I look at it I'm sad....it is "supposed" to be gray....it's NOT!!! I don't know who was looking at this and thought it was gray....but they need to check their eyes....it's more brown or copper....but definitely not gray. It came shrink wrapped so I feel like I'm stuck with it because I can't shrink wrap it to send it back....totally unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: this comfortable is the BEST thing to happen to me. It's unbelievably soft, EXTREMELY lightweight which is really important to me, and it looks nice!! But the best part of all is how big it is, which is really great because my husband goes to war every night in his sleep, and I'm constantly fighting with him to get some blanket. I got the queen but it definitely feels bigger than my other comforters. I'm so happy with my purchase I can't stop talking about it to my mom and sisters. They think I'm weird now. I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and the first time it washed up very well following the washing instructions. I have 3 kids so I have to wash our bedding frequently since one is an infant, the second time I washed again and the blue faded into the white, I reach out to the company and they sent me a replacement that I received in less than a week, the replacement has been washed up 3 times with no issues. Customer service is wonderful and the comforter is beautiful. I have a queen size bed and purchased a king size to give extra length both sides of our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Viers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality comforter, still looks brand new 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in love with this comforter. I’ve washed this several times and there has been no color fading or rips and tears. It’s wrinkle free and soft and is good for any season. I live in the desert part of Washington state, so the summers are 100+ degrees and the winters are 20- and this comforter doesn’t get too cold or too hot. Very good quality comforter for a fraction of the price you can get one in the big box retailer stores.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Comfort an durable able to keep it's shape
customer_reviews.text: Ok to tell you the truth even after reading other comments and seeing there pics I we as extremely happy once I took it out of the vacuum sealed bag it puffed right up the tears or hanging string I'm very happy my 2 chuhiuhas are loving it to 🐾 and I also bought the sheets so I can't wait to get into bed I have my heating blanket warming up and ready to sleep in my Gorgeous comforter 😴😴 Goodnight everyone 😉 Ps, Hurry and get your comfort on 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Kellylove,

customer_reviews.title: very very nice, a bit small though
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter 😍 so soft, light weight yet warm but not too warm and not too thick like most comforter's!! but I would size up for sure I ordered a king size for my queen size bed bc I wanted it to completely cover the sides of my mattress but it barely fit it 🙄 so even the king size barely fits a queen bed but other than that I am very pleased with my purchase, especially for the price! I will update once I've washed it to see how it holds up to it
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly blown away by how great this comforter is!!! The picture is when I first took it out of the bag and my son hijacked it because it felt so fluffy... fluffy!! Right out of the bag!! Its like sleeping with a cool cloud, I am so comfortable at night (which had been an issue with my previous comforter)... I also wash my bedthings pretty often, like twice a month at least for the blankets, and it dried perfectly!! No bunching of the down alternative at all. A+ for looks, A+ for comfort, A+ for value. I would order in every style if I could!!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: affordable well made quality comforter
customer_reviews.text: Parcel arrived earlier than expected and in good condition. The alternative goose down comforter seem well made with quality materials. There are some tiny shreds of loose batting found clinging onto various areas of the new fabric, but there's no open stitch to be found. Both the new comforter and new pillow sham coming fresh out of a vacuum plastic sack have no foul odor but smell of new clean fabric. Overall, the new bedding looks handsomely on my single bed. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: crzybolin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is very light weight and looks nice, but it isn’t very durable. After only one wash there are lots of strings coming loose & one my the pillow cases is ripped open. It can be sown together easily, so it isn’t a huge deal.. but I just thought I would let others know. I maybe would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: King fits like a queen
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed To fit a king but it’s more like the size for a queen. In the picture it hangs down very low but in reality it only hangs a few inches down the side. My blankets show and I am not pleased with this product at all The photo is very deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: lvsmoothjzz

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: So I brought a king size for my king size bed, as you can see it does not fit a king size bed; it barely drapes the sides. On the plus size the comforter is very soft; I like the feel of it! Since it's spring time I can't comment on the warmth of the comforter, but sleeping under it now is too hot, so stay tuned for an update when winter hits. I also like the color it is as pictured so no surprises there. It's a good buy if you don't mind loosing length on the sides of the bed. Also I will comment further once I wash it, stay tuned................
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is pleasant enough to look at, feels nice on the skin, and keeps you warm and is heavy enough to create that "feeling hugged" feeling when you're laying down. The main problem I have with it is how it's constructed. The stitches kind of make a quilt pattern on the comforter, splitting the filling into individual patches. The comforter filling isn't bound to those quilt cells in any way, though, so the individual cells of filling eventually just kind of balls up and wads into a corner of each cell. This makes the filling feel very uneven throughout the comforter, kind of a lumpy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Vichet Ou

customer_reviews.title: Get 2 sizes bigger
customer_reviews.text: The king barely covers my bed. No extra on the sides. It's very "slippery " material. It slides off you in the middle of the night. The weight is nice and its warm. King size definitely doesn't fit a king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jalyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not going to lie when this arrived it was in very misleading packaging . It looked like it was going to be thin. Then I opened the air tight package an it double in size .i thought okay .. put it on my bed an went on my day. That night we went to bed and i have to admit it appears like it won't be very warm but it certainly was . It was a warm comforter I'm very pleased with the purchase .. for the price this is an amazing buy an honestly I would have paid more for it. I'm super happy with this set an will be ordering one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy1004

customer_reviews.title: The price is great, not super high quality but what do you expect for $35 for a king set?
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting super high quality because it was only $35 for a king set. However, after washing it only once, the threading around the perimeter has started to shred, but no holes. We sleep with 4 dogs in our bed (ridiculous, I know) and replace our bedding every 6 months or so, so it isn’t a big deal for our use. The print is nice and bold and the material is soft and comfortable. Not sure why it’s unraveling the way it is but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: jessalynlee

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many comforters before but this is by far my favorite. Its super soft and has some poof to it. Feels like I paid a lot of money for this mind of quality but I'm excited to say I got it at an amazing price! I love the pattern and the color is still vibrant, even eith being in front if a window. I will be purchasing more for other bedrooms in our house!
customer_reviews.author: littlelunchbox

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! I'm the type that always looks through the reviews before I buy! I've had this blanket since about November, its been washed plenty of times and has held up pretty well! It's comfy, soft, and definitely keeps me warm! I have a queen sized bed and got the king size blanket! It's plenty big enough for my boyfriend and I!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: King is way too small
customer_reviews.text: King size is definitely much too small for a king bed. I have oriented it every which way and it just isn’t wide enough. It covers the top but only goes maybe 2 inches down the side, so you can clearly see how bad I am at putting on sheets. That being said the quality is good and it washes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It washed once and it ripped already
customer_reviews.text: My biggest issue is yeah it's nice it's warm but it ripped already and it's only been a few weeks. It probably ripped straight after we washed it in the washer and I never noticed until my toddler pulled out the stuffing so the sewing on this comforter sucks and I bought three of them so I have to go check the other two and fix wherever there's a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Gremlin Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid bed set for such an amazing price. It looks lovely. The only reasons I took off one star is because I wish it felt better to the touch(still not bad though) and I wish it draped over the sides a little more. That being said, I would highly recommend this set for anyone needing a bedroom spruce up that has a tight budget. It really does look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Sara H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about this one.
customer_reviews.text: I think this comforter is very pretty. But when I opened it there was a lot of Shedding. And also some of the stitching was torn so some of the cotton is coming out. Mind you I had just opened it. So I’m disappointed in that part.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Order the next size up!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfy! Had to return the original queen size because it barely fit. Had to jump to the link size and there is only about 6 inches of overhang on the 3 sides it hangs from.
customer_reviews.author: OneLovelyFamily

customer_reviews.title: Don’t miss out, it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t buy this because of some reviews but I’ve purchased from this company before and liked the item, so took a chance. I love this, it’s soft and very pretty, and you can’t beat the price. I ordered a size full and it fit very well. I haven’t washed it yet so can’t comment on that. Overall I’m very happy with this and recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Sladek

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it is not a high quality comforter, but it is less than $30. It is a polyester, microfiber fabric-pretty thin, with a polyester batting. It is fine. We needed something quickly, and it is going to college with my daughter. It will work, and you cannot beat the price. I will probably get her something better, but this gives me plenty of time to find something.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2cutegirls

customer_reviews.title: Must have "warm fuzzy" comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is more beautiful and vibrant than a photo gives justice to! I am in love! I originally ordered this for my daughter's bed. Once it got here I had to have one! My family got me a complete bed overhaul! A memory foam topper, egyptian cotton sheets, and this beautiful comforter! It is very light, but plenty warm for the cold. It's softness and silkyness is like when you were bundled as a baby comfort, but none of the bulk! I would suggest this 100%! I am planning to order another for my king size bed, and would like to have a couple on hand for lap blankets as winter is coming. My favorite comforter ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sheree

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS JUST LIKE THE PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE 2 TWINS PUSHED TOGETHER, SO I PURCHASED AN OVERSIZE KING FLAT SHEET IN GREY (ACTUALLY BOUGHT 2, ONE IN LIGHT GREY AND 1 IN SLATE GRAY)....I THEN PURCHASED THE KING COMFORTER, USING THE OVERSIZE KING FLAT AS A SORT OF DUST RUFFLE. AND PUT THE KING COMFORTER ON THE TOP AND IT LOOKS GREAT....THE REASON BEING THIS COMFORTER DOES NOT COME ANY LARGER....SO IF YOU CANNOT FIND A BEDSPREAD FOR THE SIZE BED YOU HAVE, THIS IS A GREAT ALTERNATIVE
customer_reviews.author: denalee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: When it came in the mail I was surprised that it was vacuum sealed, didn’t bother me at first but the wrinkles were terrible. Not to mention after spreading it out to look at it, THERE WAS OBVIOUS STAINS ALL OVER! Looks either like fabric coloring or just from being made. Stitching it inexcusable, can definitely tell a 5 year old from China working in a sweatshop made it.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: 😊😢
customer_reviews.text: When we received this, it was full of fuzzies everywhere so I washed it at the laundromat because its to big for my machine. Still full of them, here it is the inside material coming through everywhere 😢. After serval Wash's it has not changed. I love the bedding, the color is perfect, super comfortable and soft but I could truly do without all the material coming out of it 😥 super disappointed in that part. My previous one in the gray was perfect. I guess it's a hit and miss.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cynor

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to refresh a bedroom. This comforter set is great quality with a nice print and super soft material. The comforter and shams were not wrinkled at all and fit perfectly. The comforter is breathable but still warm. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RIprobz

customer_reviews.title: Size up, not thick like picture
customer_reviews.text: I have a queen sized bed but ordered a king size comforter due to other reviews saying it ran small. I'm glad I did this because it hangs over the edges of bed perfectly. Also, it isn't as thick as i had hoped but it will do. It came with pieces of the filling all over the blanket but there aren't any holes so they must just be stray pieces. Pretty wrinkled when taken out of bag. But it's decent for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Schindler

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: When we received this comforter set I thought I'd bought the wrong item because it was compressed and packaged in such a small bag. After opening it up and letting the comforter settle it is a warm, full and fluffy comforter that looks good too. Definitely worth the money for this type of comforter that runs for so much more in other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Tearing & Discoloration After a Single Wash
customer_reviews.text: Tearing & Discoloration was observed after a Single Wash using cold water and the "bedding" option on a typical washer. I recently received the set and washed it before using. It looked fine before washing the sheet. It's likely that I will not be able to return it so I'm going to try and repair the torn areas myself. But there's nothing I can do about the discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Hall

customer_reviews.title: very good and I thought I'd give this comforter set a ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were very, very good and I thought I'd give this comforter set a shot -- I am thoroughly impressed! The quality is excellent and the price CANNOT be beat! It comes vacuum-packed and once opened it becomes very fluffy :) This is not cotton nor is the fill down, but it is of excellent quality.- The color is excellent as well (not dull not patchy). Recommend highly! One last thing, because I read that they are not as big to hang off to the sides as the picture shows, I decided to buy a king for my queen bed... Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miami Doc

customer_reviews.title: Just for show
customer_reviews.text: This is a very very thin light comforter...if I can even call it that and to add on the fluff thats in it is all over the comforter and is leaking. Aesthetically looks good so its really only for show and too $$$ for something like that isn't usable. Im thinking of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped when opened.
customer_reviews.text: I opened this blanket pulled it out of the bag and found a huge rip in the side of it at the seam. Down or whatever is inside these was all over. Other than that it was great just hope you don't get one that is already torn.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work for any size or type of king sized bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its not the the measurements it says it is if you have a king or split king (we have both in the house so i tested both) you wont have any overhang its literally as wide as the mattress. If you have a cover hog be prepared to be chilly this blanket is easily stolen by blanket burrito husband's like mine lol. Other then that this would work well for a queen (also tested) hangs perfectly to the bottom edge of the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is so very amazing! I have washed it a few times now and still very nice and fluffed the filling of the blanket doesn't move around like other blankets. It's weighted nicely too the pillowcase is cool and I just paired it with 10 dollar sheet set from Walmart. There is nothing remotely wrong with the blanket my cat even scratched at it to get up a few times and no tears and no loose strings. I would buy it again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G McClain

customer_reviews.title: Great brand with great products!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 2 sets for my queen size bed at the old house. At the new house, I upgraded to a king bed and bought the bed sheets and comforter cover again since the last sets were extremely nice and comfortable. Warm in winter and cool in warmer temperatures. I am extremely happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ghaemi

customer_reviews.title: Color was different than advertised but nice set.
customer_reviews.text: The comforter set is very soft and seems like it’s made well. I haven’t put it in the wash yet though. So that is to be determined. However, just be forewarned that the color may not match the color in the add. I was under the impression I was ordering a white and light gray comforter and this was almost black and white.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: We love this comforter! It is so plush and cozy and came to us vacuum-sealed. While it was not the soft I was expecting, we have really grown to love it. It is super comfortable, is lightweight and great for cool fall nights. My husband, who gets hot sometimes during the night, does just fine with this comforter. A good buy and bargain of a price for a size king. :-) Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jenner

customer_reviews.title: Wash it and use a dryer for a more plush comforter!
customer_reviews.text: The comforter overall is amazing. It becomes pretty plush after a wash. The only down side is the feeling of the fabric is kinda cheap, its a bit rough and boarderline plasticky cotton. It's a great blanket for the price, and ill definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a budget blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Very nice comforter
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much for $26. but, since it's for my 18 yr old grandson's room, figured I'd give it a try. It is really nice!! I got the grey but it looks brown, which is fine. It came with 2 regular size pillowcases & 2 shams too. What a deal. I wouldn't hesitate for buy more of these for our other bedrooms. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dan

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a bit small but beautiful high quality set.
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews I decided to order the king size set for a queen mattress in my spare room and I’m glad I did. It fits perfectly with just the right amount of draping. I don’t think I would order one for a king mattress or it would be too short (meaning, nothing hanging over the edge of the bed.). It’s unfortunate, because I definitely would order the set for my King if the sizes were right because I do love that this comforter feels soft and it looks nice on the bed. It’s just thick enough without being too bulky so it is good year round.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Material not same as other comforter disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought a gray comforter the same exact brand but different size because I love the gray one so much and when I got the brown one it is a very slick material on the outside so it falls off of my bed and the king size is not king-size not very happy I hate returning things and now I got a squish it up and put it back in a box and return it. It is a very in expensive comforter but $30 is $30 these days very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny jensen

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I think the comforter set is nice, but it would have been so much better if the gray I chose was actually gray and not green. Very disappointed that the color wasn't gray. I purchased sheets to go with the gray comforter but now they don't match. Now I have to search for sheets to go with the new green comforter. The set is nice so far even being disappointed in not receiving gray. Now I'm looking for how long the quality will last.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this comforter. I was worried buying it because I could see from the picture the comforter is on the thinner side. Don’t let the thinness fool you, this comforter is WARM. You cannot get a better bang for your buck. If you were on the fence, take my word for it and buy this comforter. It did come a little wrinkled, after sitting out for a few days it’s completely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Mixed emotions
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to describe this but I purchased this to give to my mom. The shams are a really nice material, but the comforter, this is the problem.. It feels like a raincoat. Literally. No joke. My brother sat on the bed, and slid off. On the other hand it can double AS a slip and slide.
customer_reviews.author: Mistaken

customer_reviews.title: Great value and price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this inexpensive cover set for a spare bed that our shedding machine of a dog sleeps on. The color matched perfectly to what the seller had posted, and more importantly matches my dog's hair. Even better, it doesn't seem to pick up stains and I've been able to take it out on the porch and shake the hair out so I was able to skip two wash cycles so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grey and white fits any room!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy!!! Thick, you'll melt into it. My son spilled chili on the bed and if you grab a wet cloth fast enough, you can remove it we without a stain. I had another food spill without seeing it, and now I'll have to wash that stain under a sink and scrub because over a week passed. But I'd buy this again, and maybe I should have an extra one in my closet. I'd upload images, but my son is in all of them, loving the material
customer_reviews.author: zmath

customer_reviews.title: not thick and fluffy looking like when I first received it
customer_reviews.text: I got this comforter set for a guest room that doesn't get too much use. After a couple of months, started to notice that the comforter has fallen very flat and thin, not thick and fluffy looking like when I first received it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudzee

customer_reviews.title: A little clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This is everything it promises. We’ve had it for 6 months and washed it as needed. It does clump up, which is why I removed a star. But for what’s promised and the price, we can handle it because it does LOOK okay still. It appears smooth. But if you really try to feel for them, you can notice the clumps in the stuffing on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli H

customer_reviews.title: Over all good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is very strange grey color, more like brownish. The fabrick is a little plasticky but soft, the comforter is light but suprisingly warm on its own (even for Michigan fall/winter) Over all worth the price and Im satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Grey color is a little off
customer_reviews.text: I got grey but think it has a hint of moss green to it. It is very comfortable and soft. Went through the washing machine once so far and didn’t bundle up with the stuffing. We air dried it after putting it in the dryer for 20 mins on delicate. It’s recommended to not dry in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: alfe

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really dusty upon arrival and I have terrible allergies so I was going to leave a bad review but in light of just making things simple I washed it and tried it out and it’s warm, soft, and cozy. It’s a good comforter for a good price. It will need a few washed though but not cause it’s dirty but maybe cause it was in a room or warehouse for a long time kind of thing. I don’t know. The color is nice too. Overall I’m glad I got it, it was fast delivery and I needed something fast, easy, and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Liz Anya

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Grey queen size blanket for our guest full bed. The blanket came brown instead of grey and doesn't match the rest of the room. Needed to use 2 days after receiving so we will not be able to return but definitely not happy about the color. Guest said it was soft and warm enough. Not a winter blanket.
customer_reviews.author: cody edelen

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comes vacuum sealed, and as soon as its opened it expands greatly into the most comfortable comforter I've ever owned in my 36 years !! I was hesitant after reading some of the bad reviews , but those ppl must've just gotten one with a couple ink defects on them, or washed them improperly. I absolutely love this thing and I highly reccomend it! And, it's so much cheaper than other comforters !
customer_reviews.author: Jan'sFam

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great quality. Nicely priced
customer_reviews.text: I have a queen bed that sits a bit high because it on a platform. After reading reviews I decided to get the king comforter instead. Glad I did because its perfect. I have the matching sheets as well and I slept like a baby last night. Great quality and really soft and plush feeling. This comforter definitely hugs you at night!! I'll definitely be ordering another one for my daughter!!! Happy customer:)
customer_reviews.author: Awesome713

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought the navy color comforter for the spare bed and then bought this one for the master. The king fits a queen bed perfectly, so I am glad I went a size up. It is soft and lightweight; very cozy. The print is very cool; I love the design! I also loved the price, very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this because I love a big thick comforter but THIS IS AMAZING!! Keeps me good and warm without being heavy. It’s light and airy but still gives that feeling of that big fluffy comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Headmom03

customer_reviews.title: Really loved, and then....
customer_reviews.text: So, I love this bedspread... BUT, I just washed it and went to put it in the dryer, I noticed there was stuffing coming out and there was hole on the edge. The hole was about 6inches long and came from the stiching around the seam. I am so 😥. What was a beautiful bedspread is now falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: KMK!!

product_meta.title: Utopia Bedding Printed Comforter Set (King/Cal King, Grey) with 2 Pillow Shams - Luxurious Brushed Microfiber - Down Alternative Comforter - Soft and Comfortable - Machine Washable
feature_bullets: COMFORTER SET - Down alternative King/California King size comforter measuring 90 inches x 102 inches with two pillow shams measuring 20 inches x 36 inches with 2 inches flange; constructed using techniques that include better stitching and stronger weaving
BRUSHED MICROFIBER - The brushed microfiber fabric is 100 percent polyester which provides an extremely soft and comfortable feel
DURABLE - Solid pattern comforter is highly durable with a high tensile strength, making it strong and less likely to rip or tear; it is filled with siliconized filling
GREAT ITEM TO GIFT - Great gift idea for all your loved ones on special occasions; surprise your friends and family with this fashionable comforter set
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine wash in cold water on gentle cycle, and simply sun-dry or tumble dry on a low heat setting; use only non-chlorine bleach when needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars17,809 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
